participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, enjoys nature and family time.
participant_1.background: I always end my day with a cup of chai tea to wind down from the chaos of family life. I love growing flowers, especially sunflowers. I exercise three times a week to maintain a healthy lifestyle. I'd love to show off my gummy worm collection to my friends if I was famous. I volunteer at my local animal shelter.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and caring, values family and health.
participant_2.background: My biggest fear is that something will happen to my kids. My favorite music is the kind that gets my blood pumping and makes me want to dance. I like to do all my shopping at Walmart. I'm glad that I have enough free time to read again now that my children are grown. I am working on losing weight to improve my health.

content.text: What do you like to do to relax?
I love to listen to my favorite music and dance around. It's so much fun and it takes my mind off of everything.
That sounds like a great way to relax! I love to grow flowers, especially sunflowers. They're so pretty and they make me happy.
Flowers are so beautiful! I love seeing them in bloom.
Me too! I try to grow as many as I can in my garden.
That's awesome! I wish I had a green thumb.
It's not that hard! Just takes a little practice.
I'll have to try it out sometime.
What do you like to do for exercise?
I try to go for a walk three times a week. It helps me stay in shape and it's a good way to clear my head.
That's great! I used to be really into exercise, but I haven't been doing it as much lately.
You should start back up! It's really good for you.
I know, I know. I'll try to start going for walks again.
That's great! I'm glad I could encourage you.
